short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ShowwcaseXS: Use showwcase on every website! Experience enhanced user experience and features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ShowwcaseXS is a Chrome extension that uses Showwcase APIs. With this extension, you can use Showwcase on every website with an enhanced user experience and features on every website.

This extension is made for Showwcase users only.

Showwcase is a platform for developers to connect, share knowledge, and find new opportunities. It is a social network built and optimized for developers. Developers can connect, share their knowledge and showcase their projects with like-minded individuals.

ShowwcaseXS will open up a side bar on every website. The sidebar has a navigation bar on it which helps to open and close the sidebar. 

Sidebar has a beautifully designed UI, from where the showwcase users need to login. After login they can see features like - notification, feeds, threads, bookmarks, communities, shows, series and roadmaps. Apart from this they can also post threads directly from the extension.

The following are the Key Highlights of the application:

1. Discover Showwcase feeds
Get the latest Showwcase posts in your feeds posted by skilled professionals

2. Write and post threads while speaking
Don't just write, now you can post threads with the help of the voice typing feature in the extension.

3. Trending Shows on your Fingertips
Read high-quality latest technical shows (blogs) of Showwcase and stay ahead of the world.

Visit  https://showwcasexs.vercel.app/ to install the Chrome extension to your browser and get a premium Showcase experience
